age_range.evidence: Participant stated they graduated last year and is currently searching for a full-time job.

gender.evidence: Participant's language and interests (gaming, tech) are typically associated with males.

nationality_background.evidence: Participant's location is in Arkansas, USA.

living_situation.evidence: Participant states "I'm currently living with my girlfriend."

occupation.evidence: Participant describes their work as "researcher and a content creator" and a "contract role."

education.evidence: Participant states "I graduated from [ORG_MASKED] last year. I did. My master's in game science and design bef."

goals_and_motivations.value: Seeking full-time employment, acquiring new gaming equipment and experiences, collecting gaming-related items.
goals_and_motivations.evidence: Participant mentions searching for a full-time job, buying controllers and phone cases, collecting Lego and small items.

interests.evidence: Participant repeatedly refers to gaming, discusses buying controllers and phone cases, mentions TV shows, and mentions collecting Lego.

values.evidence: Participant prioritizes deals, researches products on Reddit, returns unsatisfactory products, and values convenience.

frequency_of_use.evidence: Participant actively shops on Amazon, constantly searches for deals, and frequently discusses online purchases.

where_used_devices.evidence: Participant uses a smartphone and desktop for online shopping and research.

search_style_best_vs_first.evidence: Participant states they often look for the best-selling products, but also considers other options.

price_preference_cheapest_vs_expensive.evidence: Participant frequently searches for deals and is willing to buy products at discounted prices.

decision_factors.evidence: Participant consistently cites price, reviews, and deals as important factors in their purchasing decisions, and frequently consults Reddit for recommendations.

preferred_categories.evidence: Participant purchases controllers, phone cases, and Lego sets.

pain_points_and_or_challenges.value: Difficulty comparing products, overwhelming number of options, ensuring product quality, finding the best deals.
pain_points_and_or_challenges.evidence: Participant expresses frustration with comparing products, mentions the high volume of options, and describes instances where products were unsatisfactory.
